job description:
Title: Big Data Engineer/SCALA Developer

Location: Dallas, TX

Data Engineering (part of Data Analytics and Intelligence) is responsible for design and build processes to integrate data from various sources to be consumed for analytical or operational purposes.

Successful Candidate Requirements:
  • A combination of architect-level experience, along with Hands on coding
    • Coding will be 70+% of the time
  • Seeking coding skills in SQL, SCALA, SPARK – must have experience with all these technologies
  • Good working knowledge of UNIX/Linux OS
  • Good working knowledge of Cloudera big data platform
  • Good working knowledge of AWS platform and components


Scope:
  • Personnel will write and support data ingestion and data curation processes by translating business requirements into applications or process designs.
  • have a solid understanding of core application architecture design, development, best practices, and application/ data security.
  • will need a good understanding of architecture definition and design of integrated IT solutions.
  • exercise application security best practices and will be responsible to develop & deploy mitigations for any application or security vulnerabilities.
  • provided by Dice
Cloudera Hadoop implementation on Oracle BDA,Amazon AWS - cloud,SQL, SCALA, SPARK
